sentences.en: Again, in the absence of well-functioning health systems, we are unlikely to get even the most basic population data on morbidity and mortality.
sentences.cn: 同样，如果缺乏运转良好的卫生系统，我们甚至不可能获取关于发病率和死亡率的最基本的人口数据。

sentences.en: Falls are linked to increased morbidity and higher health care costs.
sentences.cn: 摘要跌倒造成病患伤害及医疗花费之增加.

sentences.en: His fear of being alone verges on morbidity.
sentences.cn: 他对孤单的害怕几近病态.

sentences.en: Hollow Ones: It's a Black Celebration . Morbidity has its limits, though.
sentences.cn: 颓废者: 这是黑暗的庆典, 但是即使颓败也有个极限.

sentences.en: However, these approaches lead to increased pathology costs and morbidity, he said.
sentences.cn: 然而, 这些方法增加了医疗成本和并发症的发生.

sentences.en: Hypertensive intracerebral hemorrhage ( HICH ) has very high mortality and morbidity.
sentences.cn: 高血压性脑出血 ( HICH ) 的致残率和病死率很高.

sentences.en: In these patients, steroid - induced myopathy may lead to additional morbidity.
sentences.cn: 在这些患者中, 类固醇诱导肌病有更高的发病率.

sentences.en: In this study authors confirmed that preoperative neurological status impacts perioperative morbidity.
sentences.cn: 通过本研究,作者们确信术前神经系统状态确实影响着围手术期并发症的发病率.

sentences.en: Is there anyone out there, like myself, who is not convinced these childhood morbidity statistics have nothing to do with immunizations?
sentences.cn: 有没有人像我一样，不相信这些儿童发病率的统计与免疫接种无关？

sentences.en: Liver biopsies are invasive, costly and associated with morbidity.
sentences.cn: 而肝活检是有创 、 高成本且有并发症的.

sentences.en: Long or frequent depravity is a kind of morbidity!
sentences.cn: 长期或经常的堕落就是一种病态!

sentences.en: Objective: The morbidity rate of asthenia cold syndrome in crowd was 9.
sentences.cn: 目的: 虚寒证在人群中患病率高达9.

sentences.en: Pseudomembranous colitis usually develops after antibiotics administration. The morbidity is gradually ascending.
sentences.cn: 伪膜性肠炎常发生于应用抗生素之后, 发病率有呈上升趋势.

sentences.en: Results: The morbidity was the highest at age from 60 to 69 ( 47.2 % ).
sentences.cn: 平均年龄58.5岁.结果: 60～69岁年龄组贲门部癌构成比最高 ( 占47.2% ).

sentences.en: Results: The results showed that good results had been gained without morbidity.
sentences.cn: 结果: 随访时已有12例下地行走,无腰腿痛、患肢缩短等并发症.

sentences.en: The morbidity rate of the group of 60 ~69 years takes downturn.
sentences.cn: 五种疾病60～69岁年龄组近6年患病率都表现下降趋势.

sentences.en: The result shows that incidence of myopia morbidity is 44.84 %.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:近视眼的发病率为44.84%.

sentences.en: They do not need a third burden of high morbidity and mortality from crashes, accidents, injuries, and violence.
sentences.cn: 它们不需要因撞车、事故、伤害 和暴力造成高度发病率和死亡率的第三种负担。

words.tran_cn: 病态的；由病引起的；恐怖的；病变部位的

trans.tran_cn: 病态，不健全，发病，发病率
